tasks.title: API integration
tasks.description: Integrate third-party payment gateway API with error handling and retry logic.

tasks.title: Unit tests
tasks.description: Write unit tests for auth middleware and user service layer.

tasks.title: Performance audit
tasks.description: Run Lighthouse audit, fix LCP issues, lazy-load below-the-fold images.

tasks.title: Notification system
tasks.description: Build in-app notification center with real-time updates via WebSocket.

tasks.title: User settings page
tasks.description: Profile settings, password change, notification preferences, and avatar upload.

tasks.title: Authentication flow
tasks.description: Implement JWT refresh token rotation, OAuth2 with Google, and session persistence.

tasks.title: File upload component
tasks.description: Drag-and-drop file upload with preview, progress bar, and S3 presigned URL support.

tasks.title: Dark mode support
tasks.description: Implement system-preference-aware dark mode using CSS custom properties and MUI theme.

tasks.title: Dashboard layout
tasks.description: Responsive dashboard with resizable widget panels and persistent layout via localStorage. test

tasks.title: Design system tokens
tasks.description: Define color, spacing, and typography tokens. Publish as a shared npm package.
